alert.note: Alert for Eastern Putnam; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 5:54PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Putnam County through 630 PM EDT... At 553 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms centered near Satsuma, or 7 miles west of Pomona Park, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palatka, East Palatka, Bardin, Hollister, San Mateo, Satsuma, Welaka and Carraway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
